titles.title: Greensburg, Kansas Recovery Extension Act
Greensburg, Kansas Recovery Extension Act
A bill to provide for special rules relating to assistance concerning the Greensburg, Kansas tornado.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 3/30/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Greensburg, Kansas Recovery Extension Act - Requires funds from any national emergency grant made under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to address the effects of the May 4, 2007, Greensburg, Kansas, tornado to remain available for expenditure through June 30, 2010.
